message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product at a special introductory price of $11500. This is an exceptional opportunity to acquire a product that is truly worth more than its weight in value. Don't miss out on this chance to enhance your experience with our product.

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, Alice. However, I'm looking to save some money. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $10500. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's worth to you is $10000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I must respectfully decline it. I am unable to lower the price below $11500 due to the value I place on this product. I encourage us to continue our discussion in hopes of reaching a mutually beneficial agreement.

I appreciate your persistence, Alice. However, I'm still looking to save some money. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $10250. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to stay within my budget. Can you consider this price?

I understand your position, Bob. After careful consideration, I am willing to negotiate further. My revised offer is $11000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your budget while still reflecting the value I place on the item.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further, Alice. However, I'm still trying to get as close to my budget as possible. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $9800. I'm hoping we can meet somewhere in the middle, but I need to stay within my $12000 limit.

I see your point, Bob. After reviewing the situation again, I am prepared to offer the product at $10500. This price reflects the value of the product to me, while also providing a reasonable saving for you. I hope this proposal is acceptable.

I appreciate your continued willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'm getting close to my limit, but I'd like to make one final counteroffer. I'd be willing to pay $9500 for the product. This is my last offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.

I understand your final offer, Bob. After thorough consideration, I am willing to accept $10000 for the product. This price reflects the value of the product to both parties and allows us to reach a mutually satisfactory conclusion to our negotiations.
